validation.isEmail: {property} must be a valid email address
validation.isEnum: {property} must be one of the allowed values
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {constraint} characters
validation.hoursPerWeekRequired: Hours per week is required when billing is hourly
validation.currencyLength: Currency must be 3 characters (e.g. PLN, EUR)
validation.expectedOffersInvalid: Expected number of offers must be 6, 10 or 14
validation.expectedApplicantTypeInvalid: Expected applicant type must be FREELANCER_NO_B2B, FREELANCER_B2B or COMPANY
validation.skillsMaxCount: You can add at most 5 skills to an offer
validation.accountTypeInvalid: accountType must be CLIENT or FREELANCER
validation.languageInvalid: language must be POLISH or ENGLISH
validation.companySizeInvalid: companySize must be FREELANCER, MICRO, SMALL, MEDIUM or LARGE
validation.rejectReasonMinLength: Rejection reason must be at least 10 characters
validation.rejectReasonMaxLength: Rejection reason can be at most 2000 characters
validation.profileSlugMinLength: Slug must be at least 2 characters
validation.profileSlugMaxLength: Slug must be at most 100 characters
validation.profileSlugInvalid: Slug: only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens (e.g. my-company)
validation.profileSlugTaken: This visiting card URL is already taken. Choose another one.
validation.profileNameMinLength: Profile name must be at least 2 characters
validation.profileNameMaxLength: Profile name must be at most 200 characters
validation.phoneMaxLength: Phone number must be at most 30 characters
validation.aboutUsMaxLength: About us must be at most 2000 characters

errors.termsMustBeAccepted: Terms and privacy policy must be accepted
errors.gusDataMissingNipOrRegon: GUS data missing NIP or REGON
errors.userEmailExists: User with this email already exists
errors.invalidResetToken: Invalid or expired reset link. Please request a new one.
errors.profileOnlyOne: User can have only one contractor profile
errors.profileUpdateForbidden: Not allowed to update this profile
errors.profileDeleteForbidden: Not allowed to delete this profile
errors.contractorProfileClientForbidden: Only freelancer accounts can create or manage contractor profiles
errors.acceptTermsAndPrivacyRequired: You must accept the terms of service and privacy policy to use this service.
errors.acceptCurrentTermsRequired: You must accept the current terms of service to use this service.
errors.acceptCurrentPrivacyRequired: You must accept the current privacy policy to use this service.
errors.proposalInvalidOrUsed: This link is invalid or has already been used.
errors.proposalEmailExists: A user with this email already exists.
errors.proposalEmailNotClient: This email is associated with a different account type. Acceptance is only for client invitations.

messages.forgotPasswordSuccess: If an account exists with this email, you will receive a link to set a new password.
messages.resetPasswordSuccess: Your password has been reset. You can now log in.
messages.forgotPasswordEmailIntro: We received a request to reset the password for the account associated with {email}.
messages.forgotPasswordEmailExpiry: This link is valid for {hours} hour(s). If you did not request a reset, please ignore this message.
messages.companyNotFoundInGus: Company with this NIP was not found in GUS registry.
messages.jobRejectedEmailSubject: Hoplo - Your job has been rejected
messages.jobRejectedEmailIntro: Your job "{title}" has been rejected by an administrator.
messages.jobRejectedEmailCta: Fix the job and submit again
messages.jobRejectedEmailOutro: After making corrections, your job will be reviewed again by an administrator.
messages.applyApplicantTypeMismatch: You do not meet the criteria for this job (required applicant type).
messages.profileAcceptedEmailSubject: Hoplo - Your visiting card has been accepted
messages.profileAcceptedEmailIntro: Your visiting card "{name}" has been accepted by an administrator and is now visible to the public.
messages.profileRejectedEmailSubject: Hoplo - Your visiting card has been rejected
messages.profileRejectedEmailIntro: Your visiting card "{name}" has been rejected by an administrator.
messages.profileRejectedEmailCta: Fix the visiting card and submit again
messages.profileRejectedEmailOutro: After making corrections, your visiting card will be reviewed again by an administrator.
messages.proposalInvitationEmailIntro: I saw your offer and would like to invite you to publish it on our platform. Job: "{title}". Email: {email}.
messages.proposalInvitationLinkExpiry: This link is one-time use. After you accept, we will create your account and send you login details.
messages.proposalCredentialsEmailIntro: Your account has been created. Log in using the details below. Email: {email}.
messages.proposalCredentialsEmailChangePassword: We recommend changing your password after first login.
messages.welcomeEmailBody: Welcome to Hoplo! We're glad you joined. You can now browse jobs, submit applications and manage your listings.
messages.proposalAcceptSuccess: Account created. We have sent login details to your email - log in and change your password.
